entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
